item.title: mayhem! add a quote by Rudy Rucker
item.description:
"I think you should kill him and eat his brain," Mr. Frostee said quickly.
That's not the answer to every problem in interpersonal relations," Cobb said, hopping out." -- Rudy Rucker

item.title: mayhem! add a quote by C.J. Cherryh
item.description: "Jane leaned back against the counter and stared at the ceiling. At the traditional location of God, no matter what the planet." -- C.J. Cherryh

item.title: mayhem! add a quote by Joan Quigley
item.description: "At Tom's back, receding from view, lay State Street's Victorian brick facades, where lobbyists and trade associations housed their offices, like a Mount Everest base camp for professional influence peddlers." -- Joan Quigley

item.title: mayhem! add a quote by Rafael Reig
item.description: "Make no mistake about it, Clot: I'm a real writer. I don't have the least intention of being happy, naturally." -- Rafael Reig
